1: <mistake>/@@//ldan</mistake> 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams <mistake>cang</mistake> kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po rdo <mistake>rj</mistake> btsun mo'i bha <mistake>grnams</mistake> <mistake>ya</mistake> bzhugs so//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
2: sku dang gsung dang <mistake>thags</mistake> kyi snying po rje btsun gsang ba las shin <mistake>du</mistake> ches gsang ba'ang de nas bcom ldan 'das <mistake>kyis</mistake> bka' <mistake>srtsal</mistake> pa/ e ma'o byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
3: chen po rdo rje snying po snying rje chen po <mistake>legs</mistake> so legs <mistake>so/rdo</mistake> rje <mistake>sem</mistake> dpa' <mistake>dang/semas</mistake> dpa' chen po <mistake>dang /dm</mistake> tshig sems dpa' chen po <mistake>dang steing</mistake> po kye'i rdo rje zhes <mistake>ba</mistake> ba nyon cig /
4: rdo rje snying pos gsol <mistake>pa//gang</mistake> <mistake>phyar</mistake> rdo rje sems dpa' lags//ji <mistake>lar</mistake> sems dpa' chen po lags//gang gis <mistake>dame</mistake> tshig sems dpa' lags//bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la <mistake>gsubs//</mistake>
5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' <mistake>sul</mistake> <mistake>pa//rdo</mistake> rje mi phyed ces byar brjod//sems dpa' srid pa gsum gcig pa//'dis ni shes rab rigs pa yis//rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byar brjod//
6: ye shes chen po'i ros gang ba//sems <mistake>dpa'chen</mistake> por brjod par bya//rtag tu dam tshig la spyod phyir//dam tshig sems dpar brjod par bya//rdo rje snying pos gsol <mistake>pa/mir</mistake> bsdus
7: pa ni ji lta bu//gang <mistake>zhig</mistake> kye yi rdo rje <mistake>lags//e</mistake> yi rnam pas ci zhig <mistake>shad //bdza</mistake> yis kyang de bzhin <mistake>cing//bcom</mistake> ldan <mistake>'nas</mistake> kyis bka' <mistake>stul</mistake> <mistake>pa//de</mistake> ni snying rje chen po <mistake>nyid//bdza</mistake>
8: 'ang shes rab brjod par bya//thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid <mistake>rgud//de</mistake> ni <mistake>da</mistake> yis <mistake>bshang</mistake> <mistake>kyis</mistake> <mistake>nyon//ltha</mistake> stangs dgug dang brda chen dang//don <mistake>chen</mistake> <mistake>rnams mang</mistake> brjod pa <mistake>dang //rengs</mistake> par
